meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of microliths.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered a microlithic tool used by ancient people.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of microlithic artifacts found in the region.
meanings.sent3: The microlithic tools seemed to have a tiny magical quality about them.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as microlithic as the intricate designs on the ancient tools.
meanings.sent5: The microlithic patterns etched on the stones were mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.sent1: The necklace was adorned with microlithic beads that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a microlithic sculpture that captured the essence of ancient craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The microlithic design on the building facade gave it a unique and charming appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the microlithic gems embedded in the crown.
meanings.sent5: The microlithic structure of the rock formation made it a geological wonder.
